data.caption:
Board Meeting Intimation for Inter-Alia To Consider And Approve Unaudited
Financial Results Of The Company For The Quarter Ended 30Th June 2025
data.news_body: Amanta Healthcare Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 26/09/2025 inter alia to consider and approve Board Meeting Intimation for inter-alia to consider and approve Unaudited Financial Results of the Company for the quarter ended 30th June 2025 and would also consider the redemption of Preference Shares.

data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Amanta Healthcare Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from September 09 2025 the equity shares of Amanta Healthcare Ltd (Scrip Code: 544502) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of T Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20250905-31 dated September 05 2025.
